title: Fresh Prince of Bel Air
description: A street-smart teen moves in with his wealthy relatives in Bel-Air.

title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
description: Larry David navigates the petty annoyances of daily life.

title: East Los High
description: A group of teens navigate life and love at a high school in East L.A.

title: Insecure
description: Follows the awkward experiences and racy tribulations of a modern-day African-American woman.

title: Snowfall
description: A look at the early days of the crack cocaine epidemic in Los Angeles during the early 1980s.

title: You People
description: A new couple and their families reckon with modern love amid culture clashes, societal expectations, and generational differences.

title: Training Day
description: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective.

title: Friday
description: Two friends must come up with $200 they owe a local bully or there won't be a Saturday.

title: La La Land
description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations.

title: The Lincoln Lawyer
description: An iconoclastic idealist runs his law practice out of the back seat of his Lincoln Town Car.

title: Entourage
description: Film star Vince Chase navigates the vapid terrain of Los Angeles with a close circle of friends and his trusty agent.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption in LA.

title: The Shield
description: Follows a corrupt anti-gang unit in the LAPD as they blur the line between right and wrong.

title: Collateral
description: A cab driver finds himself hostage to a contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in LA.

title: Straight Outta Compton
description: The story of N.W.A, their rise to fame, and the cultural impact of their controversial music.

title: Lucifer
description: The Devil relocates to Los Angeles and opens a nightclub while becoming a consultant to the LAPD.
A group of teenagers from Beverly Hills navigate high school, relationships, and drama.

title: NCIS: Los Angeles
description: An elite division of NCIS tracks and apprehends dangerous criminals that threaten national security.

title: Southland
description: A raw and authentic look at the lives of Los Angeles police officers on the streets of South Central.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski becomes involved in a complex kidnapping scheme in Los Angeles.

title: Bosch
description: An LAPD homicide detective works to solve crimes while facing challenges from his own past.
